div.h2:
Introducing
iLearn Schools Connect App
for iOS and Android

div.p: With our brand new iLearn Schools Connect App now you can;

li.span: Stay up-to-date with school news and events
Securely login to iLemis to check grades and homework
Check daily lunch menu from your smart phone
Watch inspiring videos from our YouTube channel
Check your application status and receive lottery updates

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-9085042 elementor-widget elementor-widget-global elementor-global-27712 elementor-widget-text-editor

div.p: *Currently our Android App having technical difficulties due to recent Google Play store requirements. Our technical team is working on the issue. Sorry for the inconvenience.

li.div: ALL ILEARN SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED FOR ONLINE EDUCATION BETWEEN TUESDAY, MARCH 17th AND MONDAY, APRIL 20th

Please be advised that all iLearn Schools in NJ will have a 2 hour delayed opening tomorrow, on Tuesday, December 17, 2019. Bronx ASCS will follow regular schedule. Should conditions change, you will receive an updated message with new information. Thank you and be safe.

Please be advised that all iLearn Schools in NJ will have a 2 hour delayed opening tomorrow, on Tuesday, December 3, 2019. Bronx ASCS will follow regular schedule. Should conditions change, you will receive an updated message with new information. Thank you and be safe.
iLearn Schools families, Due to the predicated weather forecast for December 2, 2019 all iLearn Schools will have an early dismissal! Thank you and be safe!

Dear Passaic Arts & Science Charter School Clifton Campuses Parents, As you are aware, our elementary campus for grades K-3 will be located at 418 Mt. Prospect Avenue, Clifton, New Jersey. We would like to inform you that our existing building located at 43 Clifton Avenue in Clifton will serve only 4th grade students during […]
